joining rounds and optional single_crochet decreases and double_crochet post stitches for ribbed cuffs notes from the designer classic granny squares become fashionable in a beginner-friendly cardigan with no sewing work two hexagons instead of squares in granny stitch and then join them with row of granny stitch at the center back lengthen the sleeves with more rounds of granny stitch and add optional ribbed cuffs if desired increase body length with more row of granny stitch if you wish finish by working granny stitches around the hem front and neckline weave in the ends if you change colors often you may want to tackle these in batches as you go and snuggle into your cozy cardigan * click here 5 to watch a tutorial on how to get started making this cardigan * the sample shown in
